name: Request channel ID
Request APP Token
Save Bearer
Request USER Token
Save Bearer
Validate User Token
Authorize App
template:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<body>
    <script>
    var redirectApp = function(){
        window.location.href = "https://id.twitch.tv/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{flow.ClientID}}&redirect_uri=https://{{flow.SubURI}}/apptoken&response_type=token&scope={{flow.Scopes}}";
    }
    </script>
  
    <md-button onclick="redirectApp()">Authorize APP</md-button>
</body>

</html>

name: Authorize User
template:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<body>
    <script>
    var redirectUser = function(){
        window.location.href = "https://id.twitch.tv/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{flow.ClientID}}&redirect_uri=https://{{flow.SubURI}}/usertoken&response_type=code&scope={{flow.Scopes}}";
    }
    </script>
  
    <md-button onclick="redirectUser()">Authorize USER</md-button>
</body>

</html>
